Generation IX.Scarlet: Houndstone spends most of its time sleeping in graveyards. Among all the dog Pokémon, this one is most loyal to its master.
Generation IX.Violet: A lovingly mourned Pokémon was reborn as Houndstone. It doesn't like anyone touching the protuberance atop its head.

Generation IX.Scarlet: North Province: Area One , Dalizapa Passage , Glaseado Mountain , Casseroya Lake , Socarrat Trail South Province: Area Five ( Ground Tera Type ) Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ )
